name: The Square - Demo
description:
Your a square fighting your way through Enemy after Enemy!

Find a way out of the ruins to the kingdom and into the castle. You’ll meet friends and Rivals on your Journey beat all 30 levels in this 2D top-down shooter!  

all though this is just a demo and if you want to play the full game you’ll have to wait I little longer! Anyway I hope you enjoy playing, bye
